title: Rito i love you
body:
So basically i just had a game with a turd of a player, who basically complained that i wasn't ganking while the enemy zac was, and blaming me the whole game with the whole "shitty silver" angle as a gold 5 player.

So basically this continued on all game (with her going so far as to tell the enemy team to report me for "assisting the enemy team" and "toxicity" i was 9/2/9 btw.) and of course i go ahead and report her after the game.

And like 5 minutes later the most glorious thing happens, i get that beautiful little window saying someone i reported got banned.

Thank you for swinging that ban hammer, i was so happy to see it, thank you Rito.

replies.body: Rofl assisting enemy team going 9/2/9, wonder what she would think of my recent matches.
